title: why does rito keep auto kicking members out of my club
body: the club name is iHeim and it keeps auto kicking out my other accounts, why is this?

replies.body: I'm not aware of any system that would automatically remove players from a club.  I took a look into this for you, and I don't see a recent history of anyone leaving.  o_o  If you are still having an issue please let me know with more detail!

After further review, under club members, it shows me and 3 other accounts, all of which are lvl 30, the other remaining accounts are not even 25 i believe, as far as i can tell i still get the club name attached to my champ select name and it shows in game, so they must still be in the club, it just doesnt show them as members, do they have to be lvl 30 to show up as members?
